contentrichtext.text: '''Amaravati''' may refer to: * Amaravati, a [[Pali]] word meaning 'Abode of the Deathless' referring to ''[[nirvana]]'' * Amaravathi, surname, see [[Raju surnames]] * [[Amaravathi (1993 film)|''Amaravathi'' (1993 film)]], a 1993 Tamil language film * [[Amaravathi (2009 film)|''Amaravathi'' (2009 film)]], a Telugu language film * [[Amaravati (mythology)]], in Hinduism is the capital of [[Svarga]] * [[Amaravathi Dam]] is at Amaravathinagar, 25 km (15.53 mi) south on NH 17 from Udumalpet, Tamil Nadu * [[Amaravathi Reservoir]] is the impoundment of Amaravathi Dam on the edge of Indira Gandhi Wildlife Sanctuary * [[Amaravathi River]], flows from Kerala into Tamil Nadu, where it joins the river Kaveri * [[Amaravati, Andhra Pradesh]], a small town in Guntur District, on the river Krishna, noted for an early Buddhist stupa and a major Hindu temple * [[Amravati]], the name given to a district and its headquarters in the state of Maharashtra (India) * [[Amravati railway station]], in [[Maharashtra]], India * [[Amaravati Buddhist Monastery]] Theravada Buddhist monastery located near London, UK * [[Amaravati (Champa)]], the antiquity kingdom in history of [[Champa]] in Central Vietnam * [[Amaravati Express]], Express train organized by Indian Railways {{disambig}}
